# Capital Increase

Capital Increase

  * Capital Increase 2020 
  * Capital Increase 2021 
  * Capital Increase 2022 
  * Capital Increase 2023 
  * Capital Increase 2024 



Date: 06/10/20 a 11/12/20

Amount: R$102.282.255,27

Price: R$16,23

Bonus: for every 20 shares subscribed, 1 bonus (BIOM11)

Date: 25/11/21 a 31/01/22

Amount: R$80.071.487,04

Price: R$13,92

Bonus: for every 10 shares subscribed, 1 bonus (BIOM12)

Date: 25/08/22 a 19/12/22

Amount: R$60.058.313,28

Price: R$7,74

Bonus: for every 10 shares subscribed, 1 bonus (BIOM13)

Date: 17/07/23 a 02/10/23

Amount: R$45.000.000,00

Price: R$5,76

Bonus: for every 1 share subscribed, 1 bonus (BIOM14)

Date: 06/12/23 a 06/02/24

Amount: R$217.011.652,75

Price: R$5,75

Bonus: no

Subscription Bonus

  * BIOM11 
  * BIOM12 
  * BIOM13 
  * BIOM14 



Exercise date: 03/02/2025 até 18/03/2025

Price: R$16,23

Current price with price index adjustment/September24: R$21,04

Price index adjustment until the exercise date

Exercise date: 02/02/2026 até 18/03/2026

Price: R$13,92

No price index adjustment

Exercise date: 02/02/2027 até 18/03/2027

Price: R$7,74

Current price with price index adjustment/September24: R$8,47

Price index adjustment until the exercise date

Exercise date: 01/10/2027 até 15/11/2027

Price: R$5,76

Current price with price index adjustment/September24: R$6,12

Price index adjustment until the exercise date
